column4: where are the .desktop files of programs on applications menu???
i want to add a desktop file to applications menu
there's an icon of the game by default but when i try to add to applications menu there's no icon
do you have the little check box thingy checked?  =)
if you add an application in alacarte - it should show up on your gnome menu
OHH so there is the menu entry just no graphical icon
yes graphical icon..but in the desktop icon there was a grap. icon
maybe the png is not a valid format ?   try saving it as a jpg or something?   or re-save it in gimp?    does this happen with ANY icon you chose or just the one icon that you need?
there's no png file of this icon..or i couldn't find..is it possible? an icon with no png file? or is it in some directory that i couldn't find?
find the icon file that you want to set it to
is there a way to delete desktop icons of my hdd partitions??
